rules_text: Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 2/2 blue Shapeshifter creature token with changeling. [i](It has every creature type.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“I'm not a fan of adding people to the friend group. At first, it was fine. Bit awkward. That was until I noticed the eyes. I could've sworn they weren't always the same color as mine.”[/i]
